mapper.select: select * from pscp_cms_menu where id = #{value} and deleted=0
mapper.insert: insert into pscp_cms_menu ( id, parent_id, name, url, perms, type, icon, order_num, create_time, create_user, deleted ) values ( nextval('seq_pscp_cms_menu'), #{parentId}, #{name}, #{url}, #{perms}, #{type}, #{icon}, #{orderNum}, now(), #{createUser}, #{deleted} )
mapper.select: select * from pscp_cms_menu where parent_id = #{parentId} and deleted=0 order by order_num asc
select * from pscp_cms_menu where type != 2 and deleted=0 order by order_num asc

select * from ( select t1.*,(select p.name from pscp_cms_menu p where p.id = t1.parent_id and p.deleted=0) as parent_name from pscp_cms_menu t1)m where m.deleted=0
and m.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and m.parent_name like concat('%',#{parentName},'%')
order by m.order_num asc,m.create_time desc
limit #{limit} offset #{offset}

select count(*) from ( select t1.*,(select p.name from pscp_cms_menu p where p.id = t1.parent_id and p.deleted=0) as parent_name from pscp_cms_menu t1)m where m.deleted=0
and m.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and m.parent_name like concat('%',#{parentName},'%')
